input_text:
Job Title: Field Service Technician

Location: Irvine, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Must be local to Irvine and willing to be on the road for a week's time. International, Fast-Growth, High-Tech Company. Come join us!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Tyler May

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $25 - $28 per hour

A Bit About Us

Our rapidly growing technology company is seeking an experienced Field Service Technician. The ideal candidate will be responsible for installing, maintaining, and repairing our high-tech equipment at various customer sites. This role requires a dynamic professional who can work independently, has excellent problem-solving skills, and can deliver high-quality customer service. As a Permanent Field Service Technician, you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and contribute to our goal of providing top-notch technical support to our clients.



Why join us?


Responsibilities

 Install, maintain and repair various types of low voltage equipment at customer sites. Respond to service calls promptly and resolve issues efficiently. Provide excellent customer service, listen to customer needs, and recommend suitable solutions. Conduct routine inspections and maintenance on systems and equipment to prevent malfunctions and ensure optimal performance. Troubleshoot and diagnose issues using a range of testing tools and methods. Document all service and installation actions by completing forms, reports, logs, and records in a timely and accurate manner. Maintain a high level of knowledge about our products and stay updated on latest technology and equipment. Collaborate with the technical team to share knowledge, discuss new technology, and stay informed about company updates and changes.

Job Details

Qualifications

 Minimum of 3 years’ experience in field service, installation, low voltage, and equipment maintenance. Degree or certification in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field is preferred. Strong understanding of electrical systems and low-voltage technology. Excellent problem-solving skills with a knack for troubleshooting technical issues. Ability to read and interpret technical diagrams and manuals. Excellent customer service skills with a professional demeanor. Ability to work independently and manage time effectively. Must possess a valid driver’s license and be willing to travel to different customer sites. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Physical ability to lift and handle heavy equipment. Must be available for potential after-hours emergency calls.

If you are a tech-savvy professional with a knack for problem-solving and a passion for technology, we would like to meet you. This is a fantastic opportunity to join a fast-paced environment, work with the latest technologies, and grow your career with us. We offer competitive compensation and benefits, along with opportunities for professional development. Apply today and let's shape the future of technology together!

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
